title: Ruler
summaries: The Ruler is an item purchased from the Goblin Tinkerer.

On the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, the Ruler is an autoswinging shortsword and can be purchased for 10 SC. On these versions, the "Ruler On"/"Ruler Off" button in the upper left of the inventory toggles the display of measurement lines for counting blocks while building.

On the [img:Old-gen console version] Old-gen console version, the Ruler is an informational accessory which aids the precise placement of blocks, and can be purchased for 1 GC. It displays a grid framework similar to that of the Mechanical Ruler(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions).
(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) Its best modifier is Legendary.
